item.title: @elonmusk: UK GOVERNMENT IS COMMITTING A HORRIFYING CRIME AGAINST HUMANITY Nearly 280k babies aborted in Englan...
item.description: UK GOVERNMENT IS COMMITTING A HORRIFYING CRIME AGAINST HUMANITY Nearly 280k babies aborted in England & Wales in just one year in 2023 - the highest number ever recorded At the same time, the Labour Govt has voted to decriminalise self-induced abortions. A woman can now end a pregnancy after 24 weeks (even up to birth) without facing prosecution At the same time: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúBuffer zones‚Äù around abortion clinics make it illegal to silently pray or offer help within 150 metres ‚Ä¢ People have been arrested simply for praying quietly in their own heads ‚Ä¢ Pro-life counsellors offering alternatives are criminalised ‚Ä¢ Anyone trying to persuade a woman against abortion risks arrest The state is actively facilitating the destruction of life, while criminalising conscience, prayer, and peaceful persuasion Over a quarter of a million lives gone in one year. This is horrifying

item.title: @elonmusk: The lawsuit between Elon Musk and OpenAI is surfacing some pretty interesting evidence: OpenAI's Gre...
item.description: The lawsuit between Elon Musk and OpenAI is surfacing some pretty interesting evidence: OpenAI's Greg Brockman: "It'd be wrong to steal the non-profit from him. to convert to a b-corp without him. that'd be pretty morally bankrupt. and he's really not an idiot." Days later, Brockman further wrote under the heading "our plan" that "it would be nice to be making the billions" and explained that "we've been thinking that maybe we should flip to a for profit." Earlier Greg said: "Cannot say that we are committed to the non-profit. don't want to say that we're committed. if three months later we're doing b-corp then it was a lie. Not feeling so great about all of this. The true answer is that we want [Musk] out. Can't see us turning this into a for-profit without a very nasty fight. I'm just thinking about the office and we're in the office. and his story will correctly be that we weren't honest with him in the end about still wanting to do the for profit just without him."

item.title: @elonmusk: For the fake news peddling misinformation about the appellate ruling for Mahmoud Khalil, here is our...
item.description: For the fake news peddling misinformation about the appellate ruling for Mahmoud Khalil, here is our stance in simple terms: If you sympathize with terrorists, your presence is contrary to the national and foreign policy interests of the United States. You are not welcome here.
